sub_title: Founder and Owner of The Portugal Company I Real Estate Investment & Support I Relocation Expert I Business Development & Sales
summary:
Buyer´s Support & Property Search, Real Estate & Investment Support in Portugal.
Successfully supported and relocated various families with origins from all continents to Portugal. 
 
Founder of The Portugal Company, specialized in expat relocations and orienting newcomers to the Portuguese real estate market. Offering a wide spectrum of services to help everyone wherever they are on the continuum of making a move to Portugal.

Discovering talents in people & increasing productivity, customer support, customer service & solution oriented, strong team lead in multi-cultural setting, global thinker, people motivator, highly driven sales management & business development professional.

Specialties: Culture knowledge / International negotiation / Sales Experience /  Managment / Customer Service / Customer Support / 
Languages - (speaking 7 languages) 
Portuguese - fluent
French - fluent
Spanish - fluent
Dutch - fluent
English - fluent
Italian - medium
Chinese - 1st Level - Institute Regina Coeli

Whether you have decided to relocate but would like guidance in determining what part of Portugal (or even what neighborhood in a given city!) might best suit your family’s needs or whether you need expert guidance from a local to navigate the Portuguese real estate market, or if you’ve identified a property and would like someone to represent you in negotiations, we can help. 

With our fluency in 6 languages (English, French, Dutch, Italian, Spanish and Portuguese), you can feel comfortable that the staff of The Portugal Company will understand your needs and be able to communicate your expectations in all negotations.
